subject_terms_3: Textile art and design Indian costumes
physical_appearance: This is a piece of patola textile. It features a diamond pattern, intersected with rosettes. It is red, with multicolored woven designs.
sgcool_label_text: A fine example of a Bohra Gajji Bhat weave of Gujarati Patola. The Bohra Gajji is characterised by its diamond pattern, intersected with rosettes. This weave of patola is associated with the Bohra Muslim communities of Gujarat
